amendment.description: An amendment numbered 40 printed in Part B of House Report 118-551 to prohibit the transfer of cluster munitions.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit the transfer of cluster munitions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gaetz amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 286 (Roll no. 264).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gaetz amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 286 (Roll no. 264).
